mapper.insert: insert into menu_info(menu_name, menu_level, father_menu, context_form) VALUES (#{menu.menu_name}, #{menu.menu_level}, #{menu.father_menu}, #{menu.context_form});
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_level, (select menu_name from menu_info where father_menu = menu_info.menu_id) as father_menu, (select form_name from form_info where context_form = form_info.form_id) as context_form from menu_info;
